details: Nine civilians were killed when a car bomb exploded near a military checkpoint in Northern Nigeria.[1]
A member of Lashkar-e-Jhangvi attacked a Shia notable of Wah Cantonment area leaving him shot dead.[2]
Six people are dead in an attack by suspected Ugandan rebels of the ADF in Kitevya (Beni Territory, North Kivu). Two other people were also injured.[3]
A bomb killed seven people in Parwan Province.[4]

Part of Battle of Mosul (2016) : The Islamic State militants shoot dead 52 people in a public school located in the east of the city of Mosul, a day after Iraqi troops entered the city on the eastern front.[5]
The mayor of the Libyan town of Traghan (center), Mohamed Tahir Bakuri, has been kidnapped Wednesday by gunmen on a farm property located on the outskirts of the city.[6]
The provisional balance of the last two days of fighting in Bambari, a city 250 kilometers northeast of Bangui, capital of the Central African Republic, is 25 dead.[7]
Two Kenyan soldiers were killed and four others injured in a bomb attack.[8]

Coordinated bomb-and-gun attacks in Thailand’s strife-torn southern region have left at least three people dead . The attacks late on 2 November and early the next day appeared to be in retaliation for stepped-up security operations taken against insurgents and weren't aimed at the monarchy.[9]
A peacekeeper was killed and five others were injured when militants attacked a military base. After the shooting, a bomb exploded, killing one soldier and injuring dozens more[10]
An Israeli soldier was lightly injured in a shooting near Tulkarm.[11]
A senior relief official in Duk County in South Sudan’s Jonglei State was killed in an ambush by unknown gunmen along the Panyagoor-Duk road a local official said.[12]

An official was killed in an attack by armed men at a police post in Nurula, Rakhine, an incident that increases tensions in that state of Myanmar, local press reports. The assailants, moving on three motorcycles, used small firearms and were forced to withdraw, according to sources.[13]
Insurgents kills at least 5 special forces, 3 from Afghanistan and 2 others from United States.[14]
A Chadian peacekeeper was killed and eight others were injured, in a terrorist attack[15]
Islamic State announced responsibility for shooting down a Russian warplane in Syria’s central governorate of Homs.[16]
A roadside bomb has killed 11 people on their way to a wedding in Faryab.[17]
At least one person was killed and two others injured as a bomb blast struck the vehicle of a district governor in the eastern Nangarhar province.[18]

An Egyptian judge who tried former president Mohamed Mursi in 2015 survived an assassination attempt on Friday when a parked car exploded as his vehicle drove by, the Interior Ministry said. The target was Judge Ahmed Aboul Fotouh, who presides over a felony court in a district of Cairo. The blast caused no injuries, the ministry said in a statement.[19]
November 2016 Diyarbakır bombing: Turkish media has reported an explosion in Turkey’s largest mainly Kurdish city of Diyarbakir.[20][21][22]
At least 12 people have lost their lives and 30 others were injured in a bomb attack.[23]
A general in the Egyptian Army was shot dead today in Arish in the north of the Sinai Peninsula.[24]
A roadside bomb has killed an Afghan journalist in Helmand province.[25]
Terrorists struck in the city, killing six people.[26]
A bomb blast on Friday killed 12 civilians who had fled the jihadist-held Hawijah area in northern Iraq.
Islamic State executed 31 civilians in Ghor Province.[27]
One militant was killed and a soldier was injured today in an encounter with security forces in Jammu and Kashmir's Shopian district.[28]
One men shot dead in Waeng.[29]
One men shot dead in Rueso districts.[29]

Three arson attacks were recorded in Collipulli, Araucanía region (Chile). The first occurred in the field of Curaçao, where two forestry trucks, action which also cuts energy eléctrica. El second occurred was burned in San Andrew, where subjects torched and completely destroyed machinery agrícola. Meanwhile, in Chiguaihue were damaged a warehouse and a smaller vehicle.[30]
A French soldier was killed and four others injured after that their truck exploded because of a land mine in the north of Kidal.[31]
Part of Battle of Mosul (2016) : An Irishman was killed when he detonated a car bomb near the Iraqi city of Mosul[32]
Guerillas of the National Liberation Army (ELN) killed two farmers in the municipality of Tame, located in eastern Colombia, apparently for refusing to pay extortion money.[33]
Explosion in the Kurdish city of Şırnak kills 2 children wounds 6 others.[34]
32 members of the Islamic state group were either killed or wounded in a blast while preparing a booby-trapped vehicle in western Kirkuk.[35]
Islamic State have abducted at least 6 civilians in Ghor province.[27]
A Tunisian soldier has been killed in his home.[36]
An Al-Qaeda-linked group has released a video showing the purported execution of two Malians accused of collaborating with French counter-terrorism forces in Mali.[37]
Five border policemen including a commander were killed after Taliban militants stormed their check-posts.[38]
Two assailants try to make a mass shooting in the Atatürk Airport but they were arrested by the police.[39]
An army officer and six soldiers were killed by Boko Haram militants in a gun battle.[40]
In Somalia, two soldiers of the National Army were killed and five injured by the explosion of a car bomb, near the Parliament building in Mogadishu.[41]
An Australian was kidnapped in Kabul.[42]
One die and another were injured in bombing attack.[43]
A bomb killed a journalist in Helmand Province.[44]
One security staff was killed and three other were injured at the Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport when a person in a cleaner’s uniform attacked them with a knife.[45]
Suicide bombers have used explosives-laden ambulances to kill at least 21 people and wound many others in the Iraqi cities of Tikrit and Samarra.[46][47]
A former head of a local aman committee was found murdered.[48]
Abu Sayyaf killed a German tourist and kidnapped another.[49]
Seven African Union Mission to Somalia were killed in a terrorist attack.[50]
A soldier was killed in a fierce encounter between the army and Boko Haram.85 captives were set free.[51]

A convoy of MINUSMA was attacked in the center of the country, about 25 kilometers north of the town of Douentza. The convoy hit a mine or an IED and the assailants are then out of hiding by opening fire. One peacekeeper died, seven others were wounded.[52]
A Togolese peacekeeper was killed along with two civilians when the convoy was attacked in Gourma[53]
Militants attack a military base, killing a Togolese.[54]
Militants raided in a prison and freeing 21 prisoners. They also kidnapped a guard.[55]
More than 4 civilians have been kidnapped by IS-affiliated militants.[56]
A gunman opened fire on a group of football fans in South Sudan's capital, Juba. At least 13 football fans were killed and a dozen injured.[57]
Insurgents kills at least one soldier and another three were injured.[58]
Hamam al-Alil massacre: Islamic State killed at least 300 civilians in retaliation against individuals that refused to fight for ISIL.
Gunmen have killed more than 30 gold miners in a remote area of northern Nigeria.[59]
At least five Nigerien soldiers were killed and three others injured in a terrorist attack [fr].[60]
Two civilians were killed, three soldiers injured and 100 houses were set on fire when Boko Haram fighters raided a village.[61]
4 people have died and 6 others injured after 2 suicide bombers exploded improvised explosive device.[62]
At least seven civilians were killed in an explosion in Kandahar Province.[63]

At least four people (three local guards and one civilian) have been killed and two others were injured on Wednesday in an attack allegedly carried out by the Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK) in the Turkish town of Baskale in the province of Van (southeast).[64]
A policeman, who had been on guard outside the embassy, was wounded when unknown assailants threw a hand grenade on the French embassy building.[65]
German consulate in Mazar-i-Sharif attack: A truck bomb exploded outside the German consulate in Mazar-i-Sharif killing at least 4 people and injuring dozens more. The Taliban claimed responsibility.
Islamic State electrocuted 30 civilians to death, executed three suicide bombers, and shot dead a family of six.[66][67][68]

Islamic State has executed 40 civilians in Mosul. Islamic State has also announced it has beheaded six of its own fighters for deserting the battlefield. The Islamic State shot dead 40 civilians before crucifying them for "treason", and killed 20 more for "leaking information". They also shot dead a man for using a mobile phone, and hanged six civilians for "keeping hidden SIM cards".[69][70]
Abu Sayyaf hijacked a Vietnamese cargo ship and abducted six crew.[71]

A district governor has died after a bomb attack on his office in the southeast of Turkey and police have detained 30 people in the investigation, security sources said on Friday. The YPS, a youth wing of the outlawed Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK), claimed responsibility for Thursday's attack in Mardin.[72]
Two persons were killed today in an early morning bomb blast in the Umulari area of Maiduguri.[73]

A bomb exploded outside the left-wing Syndikaliskt Forum Kafe. No one was injured. Three neo-Nazis were arrested of the blast in February 2017. Another bomb exploded outside a Gothenburg refugee center in January 2017.[74][75]
One of the positions of the Malian army was targeted by terrorists on motorcycle. Two soldiers were injured.[76]
2016 Bagram Airfield bombing: A suicide bomber exploded outside the American air base in Bagram killing at least four person and injuring dozens more.[77]

At least 15 fighters from the Syrian Democratic Forces, were killed on Saturday in two Islamic State attacks in Aleppo and Raqqa in Syria.Another seven SDF fighters were killed during combats in the Khenez area, north of Raqqa, where IS jihadists launched a counter-attack after losing territory.[78]

2016 Khuzdar bombing: At least 55 people including women and children have been killed and above 100 injured when a suicide bomber went off in the crowded Shah Noorani Shrine in Hub town, Lasbela District, Balochistan, Pakistan.[79][80][81][82]
Islamic State executed 60 civilians.[83]
Militants attacked a military checkpoint, killing one soldier and injuring other two.[84]

2016 Samarinda church bombing: Indonesian police say an explosion outside a church on Borneo has wounded four children. Indonesian police said that one of four young children injured has died.[85][86]
Two people were killed in two attacks in Djibo.[87]
Three suicide bombers detonated their explosives inside the 'Ayn Al-Tamr area of Karbala City on Monday, killing as many as six people.[88]
An Islamic State suicide bomber killed 8 people in Baghdad. 6 people were injured in the attack.[89]
Four trucks were burned by Mapuche militants in southern Chile, seven kilometers from the route linking the city of Temuco with Labranza.[90]
A car bomb explosion in Thailand's insurgency-plagued south left two villages chiefs injuries.[91]
Two car bombings killed 8 people in Falluja. 20 people were injured.[92]
Police officer was killed in an ambush while returning home in Muang district on Tuesday night, police said.[93]
Islamic State has summarily killed 21 civilians in Mosul it accused of collaborating with U.S.-backed security forces.[94]
Islamic State kills at least 4 civilian in Pachir Aw Agam District.[95]

A suicide bomber blew himself up in a convoy with members of the Afghan National Security Forces, near the Defence ministry. At least seven people were killed and fifteen others were injured.[96][97][98]
One other soldier died and eight others were injured in the Boko Haram ambush that led to the death of B.U. Umar, a lieutenant colonel.[99]
A bomb at the side of the road was detonated in the city of Cúcuta, (border with Venezuela), wounded 17 anti-riot police.[100]
A car bomb in Thailand's Muslim majority south has injured five people—the second incident overnight to rock a region plagued by an ethno-religious insurgency against the Thai central State.[101]
An Afghan official says a Taliban attack in the country's western Farah province has killed at least eight police officers.[102]
A bombing killed 25 people in Azaz.[103]
4 soldiers were killed by Abu Sayyaf militants. 12 militants were also killed.[104]
At least 40 people were killed and more than 60 wounded after a suicide car bomb attack targeted a police officer's wedding in Amiriyat al-Fallujah in Iraq.[105][106]
Islamic State killed seven Sunni tribal fighters who support the Iraqi government and five policemen on Saturday in a town south of Mosul.[107]
Boko Haram suicide bombers caused the death of six persons, injuring many more in multiple bomb blasts.[108]
Three soldiers were shot dead in an ambush by suspected separatist terrorists in Assam. Three others were wounded.[109]
At least four FC and police personnel were killed and a civilian was injured in an ambush on Fatima Jinnah Road on Saturday.[110]
ISIS-affiliated extremist group in Egypt – has released images purporting to show the execution of a 100-year-old man.[111]
Islamic State (IS)-affiliated militant group “Sinai Province” published photos that allegedly depict the beheading of two elderly men.[112]
One child was killed and another was injured on Saturday when an improvised explosive device detonated in an apartment in Cairo’s Manshiyet Nasser district.[113]
Five members of the Shia Hashd al-Shaabi militia were killed in a Daesh ambush Saturday in northern Iraq, according to a military officer.[114]

An explosive device detonated targeting an Ethiopian African Union Mission in Somaliaconvoy near Kismayo, Lower Juba, Somalia. At least three soldiers were killed in the blast. Al-Shabaab claimed responsibility for the incident.[115]
Two policemen, including a deputy city police chief, were hurt in a gun attack in Basilan early Sunday.[116]
A police officer was wounded in a terrorist PKK attack on a police unit in the southeastern Diyarbakır Province.[117]
A Turkish soldier was killed and two others wounded in a bomb attack by Islamic State militants near the northern Syrian city of al-Bab.[118]

Syrian rebels fire rockets at a school in Western Allepo in retaliation for the civilians killed in East Allepo by the government forces. At least a dozen people, including seven children, were killed and thirty others were injured.[119]
An 80-year old muezzin gets beaten by a salafist extremist over a struggle because of ideological differences. The salafist extremist reportedly fled to Morocco after the incident.[120]
A bomb killed at least one in Kabul.[121]
November 2016 Kabul suicide bombing: At least 30 people have been killed and another 35 were injured in a suicide bombing at a Kabul mosque.[122][123][124]

At least six people, including a soldier were killed and 20 others were injured in a spate of attacks across Baghdad on Sunday. Iraqi Lt. Hatim al-Jabouri told Anadolu Agency a bomb attack in southeast Baghdad targeted a patrol vehicle, killing a soldier and injuring four others. In another attack in a central neighborhood in Baghdad, three civilians were killed and seven others were injured, al-Jabouri said. In a bomb attack close to a market area in Yusufiyye town in Baghdad, two people were killed and nine others were injured. There was no claim of responsibility for Wednesday’s violence, but the Iraqi authorities typically blame such attacks on the Daesh terrorist group.[125]
A car bomb killed 3 children and 20 others people were injured. The attack occurred in Benghazi.[126]

Six soldiers were killed in an attack on a military base, while the surrounding houses were burned. On the other hand, a woman with explosives tried to enter an army post next to the Kolofata camp on Monday, but was shot down.[127]
A bomb killed one and another 3 were wounded. The attack occurred in Chaman.[128]
A bomb killed 3 officers and another 5 were wounded. The attack occurred in Peshawar.[129]

November 2016 Israel wildfires: 50,000 people were evacuated from the city of Haifa, and surrounding towns, after "political arsonists" set fires in forests and wild habitats surrounding urban areas. At least 130 people have been admitted to the hospital.[130]
A member of Islamic State killed a colonel.[131]
Insurgents killed four security forces in Port Harcourt.[132]
At least two persons were killed in a suicide bomb attack in Maiduguri.[133]
Islamic State killed at least 6 civilians and another 30 were injured.[134]
A security guard at Khuan Ran School in Sabayoi district was shot dead by motorcycle gunmen on Thursday morning.[135]
3 Turkish soldiers were killed and 7 others wounded in an attack by Islamic State militants near the northern Syrian city of al-Bab.[136]
A U.S. service member was killed by an improvised explosive device in northern Syria.[137]
A car bomb blew up near the governor's office in the city of Adana. At least two people were killed and twenty others injured.[138]
A bomb killed one person in Anbar.[139]

location: North Kivu, Democratic Republic of Congo
details: Police accuse militiamen have killed four policemen in North Kivu. According to the chief police chief in northern Kivu, Van Kasongo, two policemen were killed and two others in Butembo in Rutshuru.[140]
November 2016 Hillah suicide truck bombing: A truck bomb killed at least 125 people in Hillah city 95 others are injured.[141]

Two young female suicide bombers attacked a town in Cameroon's far north region early on Thursday.One of the bombs exploded in Mora, killing the girl and wounding at least four people.Locals killed the second bomber before her device detonated.[142]
Eight Egyptian soldiers were killed during a car bombing in Arish. After this first attack, four other soldiers dies during a gunfight. Three terrorists were also killed during the clash[143]
Two Russian special forces and two suspected militants are killed in a gunfight in Nazran, Ingushetia.[144]
At least five people, including a Turkish soldier were killed in an attack.[145]
Multiple bomb killed at least six people and injured 27 others. The explosions occurred in Jalalabad City.[146]
Two soldiers were killed when several militants attempted to enter a mosque in Northern Pakistan. Two of the militants were killed by gunfire while the other two detonated their suicide vests.[147]
Four people were killed and several houses burned down by unknown militants in the Mile One village of Tafan District, Kaduna State.[148]

Two days of fighting between armed groups in Central African Republic have left 16 people dead, including civilians, while 10,000 have fled their homes, the UN peacekeeping mission Minusca has said.[149]
Islamic State mortars kill 16 Iraqi civilians in Mosul.[150]
November Mogadishu car bombing: At least 20 people were killed by the explosion of a car bomb near a market in the Somali capital Mogadishu.[151][152]

The PKK targeted a Turkish soldier's family with a roadside bomb in southeastern Şırnak Province's Uludere district, killing a man and seriously injuring another man. The family members were visiting the soldier who was serving at the Kuresin military base.[153]

Special Forces personnel of the Indian Army were on Saturday injured in an ambush by militants in Chandel district of Manipur. Army sources said an IED blast was triggered during a combing operation by the commandos.[154]
perpetrator: United Liberation Front of Western South East Asia (Suspected)

details: Muslim insurgents killed an eight-month-pregnant Buddhist woman and injured another in a drive-by shooting in Pattani Saturday night, another woman was injured.[155]
Two security guards were killed when militants opened fire on a vehicle of a private oil exploration company in Pasni area of Gwadar district.[156]

November 2016 Butig clash: The Maute Group briefly seized control of parts of Butig town in Lanao del Sur, in retaliation of an offensive launched by the Armed Forces of the Philippines. Government forces killed at least 63 militants and recaptured the town.
Two persons were injured when a homemade bomb exploded in front of the gate of a Catholic church in Esperanza, Sultan Kudarat province.[157][158]
A bomb exploded outside a police station. No one was injured.[159]

A blast ripped through a street in the northern Syrian town of al-Rai in what was believed to be an Islamic State suicide bombing, with several deaths reported and security and hospital sources saying 12 wounded, mostly children.[160]
Islamic State militants have fired a rocket in northern Syria that caused symptoms of "chemical gas" exposure in 22 Syrian rebels.[160]
IDF forces came under an ambush by Islamic State militants. Four terrorists were killed while there were no casualties among the IDF forces.[161]
Separatist assaillants linked with the king Charles Mumbere attaked a police station in Kasese.[162][163]

location: Lubero Territory, Democratic Republic of the Congo
details: 30 civilians were killed in an attack by ethnic Nande militias in eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo.[164]
Insurgents from Taliban militants group killed 4 border policemen. The attack occurred on 27 November in Zabul Province.[165]
A bomb killed at least three people and another five were injured in two attacks.[166]
An officer of the Burma Army and two Burma Army soldiers were killed by the blast mines in the recent conflict zone near the Kyone Htaw waterfall, Mae Tha Wor, Karen State confirm authorities.[167]
An explosion killed at least two policemen.[168]
Insurgents from Taliban terrorist group killed twelve policemen. Other sources said that three policemen and ten insurgents died in the attack.[169]
Philippine police safely detonated an improvised explosive device (IED) found in a trash can meters away from the US Embassy in Manila.[170]
Insurgents shoot dead one and another were injured. The attack occurred in Silvan.[171]

2016 Ohio State University attack: A man named Abdul Razak Ali Artan rammed his car into a group of students at the Ohio State University. The perpetrator then proceeded to stab several others with a knife. Artan was killed on scene and was confirmed to be an OSU student and Somali refugee. The Islamic State claimed responsibility for the attack.  Law enforcement officials stated that Artan was inspired by terrorist propaganda from the Islamic State and Muslim cleric Anwar al-Awlaki.[172]
2016 Nagrota army base attack: Rebels launch an attack on an Indian Army base in the town of Nagrota. At least 7 soldiers and 3 insurgents die in the attack.[173]
An explosion killed at least one and injured another six in Baghdad.[174]
A bomb killed at least 4 Somali soldiers and another 11 were injured.[175]
At least 12 Christian farmers were killed in four villages in Kaduna state, Nigeria in a fresh spate of what Christian leaders described as an ethno-religious cleansing.[176]
Insurgents killed with a sniper at least 15 children.[177] In al-Bakr district a mortar shells killed at least 3 people and another 3 were wounded.[178]
